description: This file provides frontend configuration and utility functions for API base URL resolution and health checks in a React environment. It includes methods to determine the API base URL based on runtime environment variables, window properties, or defaults, as well as functions to check backend health and initialize health status on app startup.

methods.name: normalizeBase(maybe)
methods.description: Normalizes a string to verify if it looks like an absolute URL; returns null otherwise.

methods.name: getApiBase()
methods.description: Determines the base URL for API calls based on several priority rules including runtime window variables, environment variables, and defaults.

methods.name: checkHealth(apiBase = getApiBase())
methods.description: Performs a GET request to the backend health endpoint to verify if the backend service is operational.

methods.name: initHealthCheck(onStatus)
methods.description: Performs an initial health check on app load and executes a callback with the status.
